text: Donald W. Norcross (born December 13, 1958) is an American politician and labor leader who is the U.S. representative for since 2014. He is a member of the Democratic Party. In 2020, Norcross was mentioned as a possible candidate for secretary of labor under President Joe Biden. ==References== ==Other websites== *Congressman Donald Norcross official U.S. House website *Donald Norcross for Congress official campaign website * Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from New Jersey Category:People from Camden, New Jersey Category:American political activists Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Donald Norcross
